actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, to improve the basic provisions of the veterans farm and business loan programs.

summary.text: Makes Vietnam veterans eligible for the Veterans' Administration business loan program. Raises the lending levels under the VA business and farm loan programs to $100,000 for farm loans and $219,000 for business loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, to improve the basic provisions of the veterans farm and business loan programs.
